mention.text: 14 jan 90 -- msgr gregorio rosa chavez , auxiliary bishop of san salvador
the persons reportedly involved in the six jesuits ' slaying
the result of a conspiracy -- at least a conspiracy of silence
the step taken yesterday by the salvadoran president
the 10th anniversary of msgr oscar arnulfo romero 's assassination
